entry.summary:
The German Government BKA (~German FBI) wallet sold ~6,5k $BTC in the last 6 hrs. It still holds 43k BTC, worth around $2.8 billion. The funds come from seizure of the Movie2k website operator https://x.com/ArkhamIntel/status/1752761784639881396
Arkham:‚ÄÇThe German Government is now on Arkham. The German Federal Criminal Police Office (BKA) seized almost 50,000 BTC ($2.12B) from the operators of http://Movie2k.to, a film piracy website that was active in 2013. The BKA received the Bitcoin in mid-January after a ‚Äòvoluntary‚Ä¶
